posts.post_content:
Some tough mid-tiers

Criger's only tough backs are Sov150 and EPDG.  Jacklitsch only Sov150, Sov350 and Old Mill.  Bransfield has Hindu and Old Mill but no EPDG.  And Isbell is the toughest Sov150, probably tied with Leifield.

Jacklitsch Old Mill ---------> $129
Criger Sov150 ---------> $129
Bransfield Sov150 (trim) -------> $119
Isbell Sov150 -----------> $389 SOLD

I’ll take Isbell, payment sent

Thanks Luke! Awesome Card
